ygData.subject: Re: Chains unreliablity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Have been having the problem for 2-3 months now (maybe longer).  It all seemed to start happening when I first entered sol b.  I d chain the kobolds and
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 12
> Date: Tue, 18 Apr 2000 13:51:45 -0500
> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
> Subject: Re: Selo's Consonant Chain
>
> > >
> > > Now that we are getting messages when our song
> effects wear off, I've
> > > noticed that our snare song amost never lasts
> the full duration. Many
> times
> > > it wears off as soon as I finish singing it.
> > >
> > > I was wondering if any of you were having the
> same problem and whether
> or
> > > not this is by design or a bug that we should
> bring to the attention of
> the
> > > powers that be.
> >
Have been having the problem for 2-3 months now (maybe
longer). It all seemed to start happening when I
first entered sol b. I'd chain the kobolds and they'd
run off. As I'm trying to recast I get about 6
resists in a row. It is really unreliable. I don't
know whether it is certain mobs that are causing
trouble or not. I now let the rangers snare--I've
been playing around with Largo's Melodic Binding
instead for the slowdown attack. Whether Chains got
bugged about that time or whether it is just the
certain mobs, I don't know.

> > What level are you and what mobs are you using it
> on? I've
> > found it no less reliable in duration than our
> charm/fear/mez
> > songs.
> >
>
> Hehe, I mentioned that I had EXTREMELY unpredictable
> results with chains and
> that is NEVER stuck for the full duration a couple
> weeks ago and practically
> got flamed out of this egroup :). Talk about an
> uber-thread (started with
> something about lazy snarers).
